title: Chicory: Write to WebAssembly, Overcome JVM Shortcomings
author: B Cameron Gain
description: Chicory was created to bring some of the benefits of WebAssembly to native JVM environments. It's like a virtual machine within a virtual machine.
cntitle: 菊苣：编写 WebAssembly，克服 JVM 缺陷
cndescription: Chicory 的创建是为了将 WebAssembly 的一些优势带到原生 JVM 环境中。它就像虚拟机中的虚拟机。
